name: Arkady's Outpost
description:
An independent trading outpost located on the outskirts of Larstown on the remote moon of Karth. Arkady, the shopkeeper, is a laid back, but clever woman who grew up in the desert expanse. Here you’ll also find one of the most infamous criminals on Karth: the mad cultist, Lars Rossart. This pamphlet is designed to be used with Joel Hines’ Desert Moon of Karth module, but can be dropped into any shore leave Mothership session.

What's Inside the Outpost?

  • 10+ unique items for your Mothership crew
  • Two characters with stats, backgrounds and special weapons
  • Adventure hooks to get players exploring Karth
  • A table of Karth-themed trinkets

Arkady's Mixtape: A selection of songs to add some ambiance to your visit to Arkady's Outpost.
